subject: Soccer
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: With Abby Wambach not starting for the first time in more than a decade, the United States women’s team preached calm after it couldn’t get on the scoreboard against Sweden on Friday.
snippet: With Abby Wambach not starting for the first time in more than a decade, the United States women’s team preached calm after it couldn’t get on the scoreboard against Sweden on Friday.
